item.title: How Unified Observability Practices Power Stronger Collaboration
item.description: See how unified observability strengthens cross-functional alignment, accelerates decisions, and drives measurable business impact.

item.title: How Splunk is Helping Shape the Future of Higher Education IT by Tackling EDUCAUSE 2026 Top Issues
item.description: Dive into how Splunk aligns with key priorities highlighted at EDUCAUSE 2025.

item.title: The Performance Playbook: Why Business Context Is the Key to Customer-Centric Visibility
item.description: Systems show symptoms. Business context shows impact. Discover why the future of observability is understanding what matters most to your customers.

item.title: The Architecture of Intelligent Integration
item.description: See how CIOs and CTOs can modernize data environments with intelligent integration strategies that drive coherence, reduce risk, and enable AI at scale.

item.title: The Next Step in your Metric Data Optimization Starts Now
item.description: We're excited to introduce Dimension Utilization, designed to tackle the often-hidden culprit of escalating costs and data bloat – high-cardinality dimensions.

item.title: When Your Fraud Detection Tool Doubles as a Wellness Check: The Unexpected Intersection of Security and HR
item.description: Behavioral analytics can spot fraud and burnout. With UEBA built into Splunk ES Premier, one data set helps security and HR reduce risk, retain talent, faster.

item.title: Predicting Cyber Fraud Through Real-World Events: Insights from Domain Registration Trends
item.description: By analyzing new domain registrations around major real-world events, researchers show how fraud campaigns take shape early, helping defenders spot threats before scams surface.

item.title: What the North Pole Can Teach Us About Digital Resilience
item.description: Discover North Pole lessons for digital resilience. Prioritise operations, just like the reliable Santa Tracker, for guaranteed outcomes. Explore our dashboards for deeper insights!

item.title: Security Predictions 2026: What Agentic AI Means for the People Running the SOC
item.description: Splunk's Hao Yang shares our security predictions for 2026 and how agentic AI is reshaping how we see the SOC.

item.title: What is Observability? An Introduction
item.description: In this blog post, we'll look at definitions, best practices, and key concepts around Observability in IT.

item.title: What are SaaS, PaaS, & IaaS?
item.description: Yes, the cloud makes work better. But which cloud model is right for you? Understand how SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS works in this ultimate guide.

item.title: Telemetry 101: An Introduction To Telemetry
item.description: Telemetry is powerful data that can tell you all sorts of important information. Know what you can do with this useful data — get the full telemetry 101 here.

item.title: What Are SLMs? Small Language Models, Explained
item.description: Large language models have changed the world. What about small language models? Learn what SLMs are, how they differ from LLMs, and why SLMs are the future.

item.description: Tech & IT spending is on the rise in 2025 across the globe. Read more on investment trends and see which regions will spend the most.

item.title: SIEM: Security Information & Event Management Explained
item.description: SIEM is a cybersecurity game-changer, especially for large organizations. Learn key SIEM features and functions & how to choose the right SIEM tool.
